author: ningjiang
msg: CXF-955 applied Fred's patch, also added the support for jaxws:server and simple:server, fixed the test

author: woonsan
msg: Fixed a bug originated from the revision 551861, which was done for [JS2-739].
By the revision, o.a.j.u.Path#addSegment method does not change its object any more. Instead it returns newly created Path object.
However, o.a.j.decoration.DecorationFactoryImpl class has remained as it used to expect basePath to change itself in createClientPath() method.
Therefore, DecorationFactoryImpl#createClientPath() has to reset basePath variable by the returned new Path object.

author: woonsan
msg: Fixed a bug originated from the revision 551861, which was done for [JS2-739].
By the revision, o.a.j.u.Path#addSegment method does not change its object any more. Instead it returns newly created Path object.
However, o.a.j.decoration.DecorationFactoryImpl class has remained as it used to expect basePath to change itself in createClientPath() method.
Therefore, DecorationFactoryImpl#createClientPath() has to reset basePath variable by the returned new Path object.
